subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: It will be Andy Roddick versus Roger Federer in Sunday’s United States Open final, which sounds like a much more scintillating tennis matchup than it has typically been.
snippet: It will be Andy Roddick versus Roger Federer in Sunday’s United States Open final, which sounds like a much more scintillating tennis matchup than it has typically been.
